thread.title: BRIEF-Integer Holdings Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.68

title: BRIEF-Integer Holdings Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.68
text: 23 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-Integer Holdings Q4 GAAP Earnings Per Share $1.68 Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Integer Holdings Corp: * ORATION REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 * Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.68 * Q4 REVENUE $390 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.96 * SEES ‍FY SALES $1,490 MILLION TO $1,530​ MILLION * SEES ‍FY EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.55 TO $1.85​ * SEES FY ADJUSTED EPS $3.15 TO $3.45​ * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.79, REVENUE VIEW $358.4 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.23, REVENUE VIEW $1.47 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
